title: Is this enough?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/r8y6PZl.png
I think this is enough.

replies.body:
some mouses have a "doubleclick button" which lets you just hold it down and it will left click supper fast, i got to 9999 in just a few minutes.

edit: i hope this isnt considered scripting, considering its not in game...
